my:Details.my:Title: Rigging / Stowing of Accommodation Ladder / Portable Gangway

my:Hazard.my:ControlMeasures: a) Consult 'Manual Handling' Risk Assessment; b) Sufficient number of crew to be made available for the task.

a) All crew should be made aware of any planned ballast operations; b) The OOW and Watchman should monitor the affects of ballast operations on the accommodation ladder / gangway and adjust the accommodation ladder / gangway accordingly.
